profileUrls.title: Profile URLs
profileUrls.description: List of LinkedIn profile URLs to scrape. Provide at least one of the 3 fields: URLs or Public Identifiers or Profile IDs

profilePublicIdentifiers.title: Public Identifiers (last part in the URL)
profilePublicIdentifiers.description: List of LinkedIn Public Identifiers. Provide at least one of the 3 fields: URLs or Public Identifiers or Profile IDs

profileIds.title: LinkedIn Profile IDs
profileIds.description: List of LinkedIn profile IDs to scrape. Provide at least one of the 3 fields: URLs or Public Identifiers or Profile IDs

scrapePages.title: Number of pages to scrape
scrapePages.description: Number of pages to scrape from the profile. Default is 1. Page size is 20 posts.

page.title: Page number to start scraping from
page.description: Page number to start scraping from. Default is 1. Page size is 20 posts.

postedLimit.title: Posted Limit (filter) '24h', 'week', 'month'.
postedLimit.description: Fetch only posts for the last X time. Options: '24h', 'week', 'month'.
